title: Aural set, soprano/piano - phrase 1 and 2 form

content.description: You will hear an excerpt for voice and piano. The excerpt, which consists of six phrases of equal length, will be played three times. Before listening to the music for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: Phrases 1 and 2 together form a

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in performed music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
